about_the_game:
🦙Travel-Sized Happiness 

Step into a world of pure joy with our game Campoca. This game is your go-to feel-good experience, where you simply can't fail!

Everything Interactive

Immerse yourself in an interactive wonderland where every element is designed to bring a smile to your face. This game brings happiness right into your heart with very simple controls - just bring your mouse or trackpad!

Explore the Campsite

Explore the campsite and earn rewards by participating in feel-good activities and use them to decorate your very own campsite.

Completely Free & No In-Game Purchases

Everything in Campoca is absolutely free to download and play, with no in-game purchases or data collection. If you love what we’re creating, consider supporting us with a “Buy us a Hot Cocoa” option!

Everything Cozy and Wholesome

Campoca is where wholesome relaxation awaits you. Every moment is designed to fill your heart with the happiness, something much needed today!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Graphics: M1 with strong GPU

name: Campoca
short_description: Enter Campoca, where feel-good activities and delightful interactions are yours to enjoy completely for free! Collect joyful memories and turn your campsite into a charming, heartwarming retreat!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Afrikaans, Albanian, Amharic, Armenian, Assamese, Azerbaijani, Bangla, Basque, Belarusian, Bosnian, Catalan, Cherokee, Croatian, Dari, Estonian, Filipino, Galician, Georgian, Gujarati, Hausa, Hebrew, Hindi, Icelandic, Igbo, Irish, K'iche', Kannada, Kazakh, Khmer, Kinyarwanda, Konkani, Kyrgyz, Latvian, Lithuanian, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Malay, Malayalam, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Mongolian, Nepali, Odia, Persian, Punjabi (Gurmukhi), Punjabi (Shahmukhi), Quechua, Scots, Serbian, Sindhi, Sinhala, Slovak, Slovenian, Sorani, Sotho, Swahili, Tajik, Tamil, Tatar, Telugu, Tigrinya, Tswana, Turkmen, Urdu, Uyghur, Uzbek, Valencian, Welsh, Wolof, Xhosa, Yoruba, Zulu
